title: Balibo
overview: As Indonesia prepares to invade the tiny nation of East Timor, five Australian based journalists go missing. Four weeks later, veteran foreign correspondent Roger East is lured to East Timor by the young and charismatic Jos√© Ramos-Horta to tell the story of his country and investigate the fate of the missing men.
